title: ETSI Domain AI + Human Interface
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-ai-human-interface-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20334
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain AI + Human Interface
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Cross-domain marker for metaverse components combining artificial intelligence with human interaction systems including conversational AI, gesture recognition, emotion detection, and intelligent user experience adaptation.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainAIHumanInterface
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[ComputationAndIntelligenceDomain]], [[InteractionDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-ai-human-interface-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[ArtificialIntelligence]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- enables:: [[Intelligent UX Categorization]]
		- enables:: [[Conversational AI Classification]]
		- categorizes:: [[Conversational AI]]
		- categorizes:: [[Adaptive UI]]
		- categorizes:: [[Emotion AI]]
		- categorizes:: [[Gesture Recognition]]
		- depends-on:: [[ETSI Domain AI]]
		- depends-on:: [[InteractionDomain]]

ontology.definition: Cross-domain marker for metaverse components combining artificial intelligence with human interaction systems including conversational AI, gesture recognition, emotion detection, and intelligent user experience adaptation.
